metadata.dc:author: Rioja Sanz, L A
Mallén Mateo, E
Blas Marín, M
García de Jalón Martínez, A
Sancho Serrano, C
Pascual Regueiro, D
metadata.dc:description: The endoscopical resection of the urether in the radical nephroureterectomy is an easy way to treat transitional cell carcinoma of the upper urinary tract. We want to present a complication derived from this surgical technique: the tumor implantation in the resected ureteral meatus zone.
metadata.dc:title: Recidiva tumoral en la zona de resección del meato ureteral tras desinserción endoscópica en la nefroureterectomía radical.
[Tumor recurrence in the resected area of the ureteral meatus after endoscopic disinsertion during radical nephroureterectomy].
